title: OIDC Logout doesn't work after 5 minutes
body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus OIDC logout functionality works as expected immediately after user logged in, but fails after 5 minutes. It doesn't matter if user is idle or triggering some Ajax requests. 

### Expected behavior

After clicking on Logout link user is logged out.

### Actual behavior

Clicking on logout link fails with:
`{"errorId":"4e309bd4-1537-4799-8ec5-9f51cf15e53c","errors":[{"path":"An error has occurred. If you are not clear how to fix it on your end - please contact support.","message":"RESTEASY003210: Could not find resource for full path: https://dev.collarclubvernon.ca/secure/logout"}]}`

Or with 'Page Not found', depending from the web app error handling.

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer project (created from https://github.com/melloware/quarkus-faces) can be cloned from here https://github.com/zeppelinux/quarkus-oidc-reproducer

To reproduce:
1. mvn clean compile quarkus:dev (it uses Dev services for Keycloak deployment, requires Docker)
2. Navigate to  http://localhost:8081
3. Login with bob:bob
4. Click on 'Log Out' link in the toolbar and see it logs out successfully
5. Login again . You can click some buttons or navigate to different pages.
6. Wait 5 min
7. Try to logout
8. Observe 'Page Not Found' and the actual logout did not happen


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Mac OS Ventura 13.4

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.2" 2022-01-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 17.0.2+8-86) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.2+8-86, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.2.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.6 (84538c9988a25aec085021c365c560670ad80f63) Maven home: /usr/local/Cellar/maven/3.8.6/libexec Java version: 17.0.2, vendor: Oracle Corporation, runtime: /Users/dimas/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/openjdk-17.0.2/Contents/Home Default locale: en_CA, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "13.4", arch: "x86_64", family: "mac"

### Additional information

_No response_
